adjectives.description: epistemological (comparative more epistemological, superlative most epistemological)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to epistemology or theory of knowledge, as a field of study.
examples: The epistemological position of Ritschl, in our author's exposition of it, is little more than idealistic rationalism.

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to knowing or cognizing, as a mental activity.
examples: The reality which thus emerges is the outcome of the epistemological process in which the mind conceptually structures a given content.
